text: At Home Among Strangers () is a 1974 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikita Mikhalkov.Запечатленные на экранеСвой среди чужих, чужой среди своих It stars Yuri Bogatyryov, Anatoly Solonitsyn, and Alexander Kaidanovsky. ==Actors== * Yuri Bogatyryov as Egor Shilov * Anatoly Solonitsyn as Sarychev * Alexander Kaidanovsky as rittmeister Lemke * Nikita Mikhalkov as Brylov * Aleksandr Porokhovshchikov as Kungarov * Sergey Shakurov as Zabelin * Nikolai Pastukhov as Stepan Lipyagin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikita Mikhalkov
title: At Home Among Strangers
